attributes.action: Scrap All MPs Expenses for Second homes.
attributes.additional_details: Its not right that MP get paid expenses to support second homes. Especially now they have removed the winter fuel allowance from the most vulnerable. Its disgusting that Tax payers are still funding MPs second homes, when the Gov aresaying they fmdonrmt have money to support the most vulnerable winter. Mps need to stay in a hotel or Gov provide flats that they all share.
attributes.background: In a time of austerity, its time to Scrap all MP expenses, for second homes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 
 
You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
